WorkItem.ClosedComment: Please let us know if the 0.9.5 beta fixes it and re-open the issue if it doesn't. Thanks!
WorkItem.Description:
I downloaded the latest version of TypeScript (0.9.1.1)

Then after the new project in VS2013,
Press F5, an error
Figure.

I try to find the cause,
See "Microsoft.TypeScript.targets" file

```

    <PreferredUILang Condition="'$(BuildingInsideVisualStudio)' == 'true' and '$(PreferredUILang)' == ''">$([System.Globalization.CultureInfo]::CurrentUICulture.Name)</PreferredUILang>


```


"$ ([System.Globalization.CultureInfo] :: CurrentUICulture.Name)"
This seemingly Powershell statement returns in Chinese system is "zh-CN"

But I try to delete this line, but in VS still does not start, (have tried to close and reopen VS)


However, at the command line using MSBUILD is no problem. Just a little too much trouble

System is Win2012 R2 Simplified Chinese version


PS. In addition, will be able to insert TypeScript file in VB project? Thank you.

Comments.Message: There is a later version that you may want to try out :https://typescript.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=TypeScript%200.9.5%20beta

0.9.5 beta is no problem,
Just do not know why the new project at run time, the working path IIS Express is a temporary folder.

But if it is to add items to the solution (that have two or more projects in the solution inside) when
Did not have this problem.

Once you open the page correctly, others are also normal. .
